Summary: Three lights taken by investigator, 2nd sighting in 2 weeks, while on jet, over Utah, Colorado?
divs: sighting detailsi was flying home from vegas on 7\15\09. i was taking a picture of the sunset out of the port side widow of the jet flying east from vegas to st. louis at 10:15pm when i saw three bright lights flying in a pyramidal pattern up from the horizon. i barely had enough time to snap this picture with my blackberry phone before the lights disappeared behind the wing tip of the jet. look just behind the left wing to view three bright lights. these are the same three similarly configured lights i saw on 7\27\09 in utah, near the bonneville salt flats, that i reported yesterday to mufon. two sightings in two weeks? there must be heavy activity out west for this to occur twice in two weeks?
